name: 15-minute Vegetarian Chili

ingredients.name: Chili Seasoning or Chipotle Aioli Mix

preparation: Heat ground soy in Multipurpose Pot over medium-high heat for approximately 2 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients and heat for approximately 8 minutes.
tips: Double this recipe for easy Epicure Cheater’s Sloppy Joes on another day.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Chili Seasoning (1001136)
summary: Make classic, restaurant-quality chili at home with better-for-you ingredients.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.
